basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Vivek Khodade. Fullstack Developer. Love to develop apps using Javascript. I have completed my Masters degree in Computer Application(MCA) from Pune University and Bacholors degree in Computer Application(BCA) from Bharti Vidyapeeth Deemed University.

projects.title: Adura CRM
projects.description: CRM, CLM, CTI, Telephony, IVRS, Email response management, Sales force management, Omnichannel, Order Management , Case Management Solution, Ticket Management Solution, Customer Experience , Business Growth engine Manger, configurable CRM, single license product, Customer interaction management, CIM, Frontline Support, Lead Management, Campaign manager , Campaign management, omni desktop, customer champion, End to end customer management, Quality management, survey and feedback mangement, CSAT, Customer behavior tracker, customer Analytics, and workforce management.

projects.title: Aquire CRM Mobile App
projects.description:
To provide the Aquire CRM Mobile Application as alternative platform to use ADURA CRM. 
To maintain the customer details, communication, data and history. 
To capture the compliant and additional details about the customer using ticket. 
To create the ticket and update the states of ticket using interaction and ticket module.
To show the funnel chart of working ticket states.
To use the application create the user/agent as end user of the Application.

projects.title: Self Service Portal
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Peppy Social App
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Prime Partners
projects.description: DRL had a challenge to engage maximum retailers and build their loyalty with the organisations. In order to engage maximum retailers, DRl launched the biggest loyalty retailer bonus programme. The App created had a technical advantage of OCR technology which enabled retailers to feed information without typing.
